title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 March 2016 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
17:54 <tmortagne> ok first time I notice then  
17:54 <vmassol> I'm restarting it but notifications don't work well  
17:55 <vmassol> usually it's connected but we don't get wiki notifs  
17:55 <vmassol> you're ucky  
17:55 <vmassol> \*lucky  
17:55 <vmassol> on my side I can't edit the objects...  
17:56 <vmassol> you're taking teh easy extensions :)  
18:01 <vmassol> not sure what to do tmortagne….  
18:01 <vmassol> I really don't want to have to write a script to update some xobjects….  
18:01 <vmassol> any idea?  
18:01 <tmortagne> vmassol: you don't need a script, just the right URL  
18:01 <vmassol> yes sure that's about the same ciomplexity  
18:02 <tmortagne> it's a bit simpler than a script when you have an example  
18:02 <vmassol> need to find the xobject id, number, etc  
18:02 <tmortagne> right, you need the number  
18:03 <vmassol> I guess I can get it through xpage=xml  
18:04 <vmassol> actually no  
18:04 <vmassol> s/no/yes  
18:04 <vmassol> hmmm  
18:05 <vmassol> it says <number>0 for several...  
18:05 <vmassol> ah no differen xobjects  
18:06 <cjd> has quit  
18:06 <vmassol> anyway it won't work probably for adding the RN content, I guess this is passed in the request body in a put or post  
18:07 <vmassol> since the doc is in memory in the doc cache, we could probably relatively easily provide a request param to only display xobjects of a given class  
18:08 <tmortagne> I think there is something like this actually  
18:08 <vmassol> ok checking quickly  
18:08 <tmortagne> hmm maybe it was for a single object actually  
18:09 <tmortagne> yep single object  
18:09 <tmortagne> for example: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/Extension/ZoneEdit+Macro?editor=object&classname=ExtensionCode.ExtensionDependencyClass&object=3  
18:09 <vmassol> #set ($class = $xwiki.getClass(${request.className}))  
18:09 <vmassol> request.className  
18:09 <vmassol> trying  
18:09 <tmortagne> actually if you remove the "object" parameter it's all objects  
18:10 <vmassol> what is object?  
18:10 <tmortagne> look at the URL in pasted  
18:10 <vmassol> I'm looking zat it  
18:11 <tmortagne> you have a object parameter at the end with the object number  
18:11 <vmassol> but it doesn't explain what object is  
18:11 <vmassol> :)  
18:11 <vmassol> the number?  
18:11 <tmortagne> (06:11:03 PM) tmortagne: you have a object parameter at the end with the object number  
18:11 <vmassol> k  
18:11 <vmassol> works  
18:15 <mflorea> evalica: I just noticed that http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Query+Module has horizontal scroll bar on the content. I don't know if it's specific to the xwiki.org skin or not.  
18:16 <mflorea> it makes the table with the query examples hard to read  
18:17 <mflorea> has quit  
18:20 <tmortagne> indeed XWQL column used to be smaller  
18:22 <tmortagne> we should maybe force a width for HQL and XWQL columns  
18:22 <tmortagne> right now it's pretty much unusable  
18:24 <evalica> tmortagne: is better like this?  
18:24 <evalica> made a change  
18:27 <tmortagne> has quit  
18:29 <evalica> has quit  
18:43 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:43 <lkrejci> has quit  
18:44 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
18:46 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
18:46 <vmassol> FAQ move finished!  
19:09 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
19:18 <asam> has joined #xwiki  
19:29 <mflorea> has quit  
19:33 <woshilapin> has quit  
19:42 <Devk> has joined #xwiki  
19:46 <Devk> I know this time is very late to ask this question but i need know about the expectations for accepting a proposal of the Blame view Module GSoC idea?  
19:50 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
19:58 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
20:07 <vmassol> hi Devk, you can find some info at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/  
20:07 <vmassol> especially http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/Guidelines  
20:08 <vmassol> sorry I have to go, dinner time here :)  
20:08 <Bugendolf> has quit
